titleStmt.title: The Christian mans teares and Christs comforts. Delivered at a fast the seventh of Octob. An[n]o. 1624. By Gilbert Primerose minister of the French Church of London.
titleStmt.author: Primrose, Gilbert, ca. 1580-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Bartlet, at the gilt Cup in the Gold-Smiths Row in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: Print show-through; pages stained and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the gilt Cup in the Gold-Smiths Row in Cheape-side
